entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LINQ range variable types are forced to be non-nullable no matter what is assigned #61863
  • EditorConfig UI shouldn't include roaming-only code-style options #61860
  • `FadeOutComplexCollectionInitialization` is not initialized nor read #61859
  • `AbstractMatchFolderAndNamespaceDiagnosticAnalyzer` doesn't bail out for `PreferNamespaceAndFolderMatchStructure` #61858
    17.4
  • `PreferSystemHashCode` is not set #61857
  • Have a way to make sure VS code-style options UI is up to date #61856
  • Re-work AutomationObject design #61855
  • New public APIs for Unsigned Right Shift #61854
  • CompilationWithAnalyzer.GetAnalyzerDiagnosticsAsync returns 0 diagnostics even though the analyzers do run & report #61851
    17.3
  • IDisposable analyzer #61850
  • New public APIs for UTF8 String Literals #61847
  • New public APIs for Checked User-defined Operators #61846
  • [Regression]: Setting code-style options severity via `Tools` → `Options` has no effect #61844
    17.3
  • checked expression containing switch expression has no effect #61843

Closed

  • Inconsistency around accessibility checks for interface implementations #60885
    C# 11.0
  • Warning to programmer about sync Task return in c# #61625
    Backlog
  • CSharp Style - Blank Line After Close Brace #61861
  • Adjust implementation of user-defined conversion resolution according to the latest LDM decision #61470
    C# 11.0
  • Require spaces within the enhanced `#line` directive #61663
    17.3
  • Disallow an interface containing or inheriting static abstract/virtual members as a type argument #61461
    C# 11.0
  • VB compiler crashes with `NullReferenceException` in decoding well-known attributes #61492
    Compiler.Next
  • `SyntaxList<TNode>` doesn't return the original nodes when passing an `IEnumerable<TNode>` #61836

PullRequests

Created

  • Promote CompletionList.ItemsList to public API #61869
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1822527 #61868
  • Sort the generated CodeAction telemetry table. #61867
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61866
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61865
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add Asp.net extensibility point for document highlighting. #61864
    Area-IDE
  • Experiment with limits in EndToEndTests.Constraints #61852
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Simplify embedded language export system. #61862
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61849
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Report an error for an implicit implementation of an inaccessible interface members #61717
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1811661 #61735
  • Fix BuildActionTelemetryTable tool #61795
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61758
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update document highlighting to follow new pattern for embedded language extensibility. #61817
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Adjust implementation of user-defined conversion resolution according to the latest LDM decision #61754
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Use the complete branch name in DartLab yml #61821
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval, Next
  • Simplify export attribute for embedded language features #61853
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Require spaces within line span directives and relax LangVer check #61686
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Organize contributing notes and add WSL testing section #61408
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Disallow an interface containing or inheriting static abstract/virtual members without implementation as a type argument #61775
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Fix VB compiler crashes when decoding attributes #61537
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61871
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #61870
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add Document Outline Tool Window #61784
    Area-IDE
  • Polish async suggestions #61840
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Remove invalid implicit downcast #19932
    Area-Compilers
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Add support for reporting project level diagnostics in workspace pull #61819
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Remove the feature flag and change the default for open generated files #60976
    Area-IDE
  • Enable .Net Core OOP by default #60163
    Area-IDE
  • Provide parse options to the language service more quickly #60855
    Area-Compilers
  • IOperation: expose information about the type parameter that is going to be used as the ".constrained" type for invoking abstract static methods #61811
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • 🚧 Support renaming symbols when the editor tries to fix a spell checking mistake. #61802
    Area-IDE
  • Serializable option set #61839
    Area-IDE
  • Unwrap the cause (inner exception) of operation canceled exceptions when reporting faults #61787
    Area-IDE
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements in VB #61569
    Area-Compilers
  • Change ServiceHub host names #60778
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cleanups for our logging helpers #61669
    Area-IDE
  • Calculate containing type effective accessibility for required member enforcement #61643
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Merge semantic snippets into main #61658
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix invalid cast when removing unreachable code in top-level programs #61830
    Area-IDE, Community
